text: Torino F.C. 1906 is a football club which plays in Italy. == Names == * 1906–1936: F.B.C. Torino * 1936–1970: A.C. Torino * 1970–2005: Torino Calcio * 2005–present: Torino F.C. 1906 == League title == *Italian Football Championship / Serie A : 7 **1927/28, 1942/43, 1945/46, 1946/47, 1947/48, 1948/49, 1975/76 *Serie B : 3 **1959/60, 1989/90, 2000/01 ==League position== Season League Position 2000/01 Serie B Champions 2001/02 Serie A 11th 2002/03 Serie A 18th 2003/04 Serie B 12th 2004/05 Serie B 3rd 2005/06 Serie B 69th 2006/07 Serie A 16th 2007/08 Serie A 15th 2008/09 Serie A 18th ===Former position=== Category:1906 establishments in Italy Category:Italian football clubs Category:Organizations based in Turin
title: Torino F.C.
